description: GPA 83.5 of 100; When I was studying at State Vocational High School 2 Kendal, I was selected to represent my school in the Central Java Provincial Student Competency Competition in the field of Electrical Installation. I was also chosen to participate in an industry certification program in PLC programming and electrical installation.

GPA 3.65 of 4; During my studies at the Polytechnic State of Semarang, I actively participated in a faculty research project on a smart irrigation system for Granola G0 potato seedlings. I was also trusted to serve as a teaching assistant for the Computer-Based Control Laboratory course, focusing on water level control and motor-generator control systems
